page.title: 08OFFCHURCH - THE STAG'S HEAD
page.content: { The Stag's Head}is the only public house in{Offchurch.} Originally it was frequented only by local residents but today it draws its clientele from a much wider area, some travelliing as far as twenty miles to enjoy a drink or meal in typically English country surroundings. Trade is seasonal, Summer being the busiest time. The most popular drink is{Bitter beer}and, according to the licensee, four barrels of beer are consumed nearly every week. {Meals}are available at lunch time and in the evening. { Prices range from Â£1.60 for a {Ploughman's Lunch (bread, cheese and {chutney) to Â£4.95 for a giant rump {steak, served with chips and peas.
